para.dtcname: Lost Communication With ECM/PCM "A" Missing Message
Lost Communication with Multi-axis Acceleration Sensor Module Missing Message
Lost Communication with Steering Angle Sensor Module Missing Message
Lost Communication with Brake System Control Module Missing Message
Lost Communication with Instrument Panel Cluster (IPC) Control Module Missing Message

content5.ptxt: When a malfunction is detected between various ECUs and sensors, these DTCs are stored.

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Lost Communication With ECM/PCM "A" Missing Message

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: While the vehicle is being driven at 5 km/h (4 mph) or more, a communication error between the ECM and the forward recognition camera is detected for approximately 6 seconds or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: CAN communication system

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Lost Communication with Multi-axis Acceleration Sensor Module Missing Message

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: While the vehicle is being driven at 5 km/h (4 mph) or more, a communication error between the airbag sensor assembly and the forward recognition camera is detected for approximately 4 seconds or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: CAN communication system

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Lost Communication with Steering Angle Sensor Module Missing Message

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: 3 seconds after the ignition switch is turned to ON, a communication error between the steering angle sensor (spiral with sensor cable sub-assembly) and the forward recognition camera is detected for approximately 1 second or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: CAN communication system

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Lost Communication with Brake System Control Module Missing Message

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: 3 seconds after the ignition switch is turned to ON, a communication error between the skid control ECU (brake actuator assembly) and the forward recognition camera is detected for approximately 1 second or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: CAN communication system

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Lost Communication with Instrument Panel Cluster (IPC) Control Module Missing Message

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: 3 seconds after the ignition switch is turned to ON, a communication error between the combination meter assembly and the forward recognition camera is detected for approximately 50 seconds or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: CAN communication system

gts-info.title: Body Electrical > Pre-Collision System > Clear DTCs

test1.ptxt: Reproduce the vehicle conditions that were present when the DTCs that were noted were stored.

atten4.ptxt: If the detection conditions are not met, the system cannot detect malfunctions.

gts-info.title: Body Electrical > Pre-Collision System > Trouble Codes

entry.ptxt: CAN communication system DTC is not output
CAN communication system DTC is output
